Package ooga.model.components.moves

Class Gravity

java.lang.Object
ooga.model.components.moves.PieceMovement
ooga.model.components.moves.Gravity
public class Gravity
extends PieceMovement
This class represents a piece that falls to the lowest possible y-coordinate vacant on the GameBoard, while maintaining its x-coordinate. This class should be used via reflection, and should be defined in the GamePiece's .xml file in the nested parameters: 
 
 <moves>
     <Gravity>
     </Gravity>
 </moves>

    • Gravity

      public Gravity​(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> parameters, int direction, GameBoard gameBoard, GamePiece piece)
      The constructor takes the parameters of the move. This includes the change in position of the move, as well as the information about whether this move can take a piece
      Parameters:
      parameters - The map of parameters
      direction - The multiplier used to change the direction that the piece uses
      gameBoard - The board that the piece moves on

  • Method Details

    • getAllPossibleMoves

      public java.util.List<Coordinate> getAllPossibleMoves​(Coordinate coordinates, java.lang.String pieceTeam)
      Gets the single move associated with this Gravity movement object. Will be a single set of a single coordinate or no coordinates.
      Specified by:
      getAllPossibleMoves in class PieceMovement
      Parameters:
      coordinates - The coordinates of the piece that this move is acting on
      pieceTeam - The name of the team of this piece
      Returns:
      A list of the coordinates of possible moves
